description.title: Description
description.content: Millet Vaan’s Premium Sprouted Millets Pro-Energy Mix is a wholesome and natural health drink made from sprouted millets. It’s designed to boost energy and support wellness, with zero refined sugar, preservatives, or dairy. A perfect daily nutrition partner for the health-conscious.

description.title: Ingredients
description.content: Sprouted millets (ragi, bajra, jowar, foxtail millet), green gram, chickpeas, soybeans, cardamom, dry ginger, and other natural herbs and spices.

description.title: How to Use
description.content: Mix 2 tablespoons with a cup of water or plant-based milk. Boil for 3–5 minutes while stirring. Optionally sweeten with jaggery or your preferred healthy sweetener. Enjoy warm as breakfast or a mid-day snack.
